![Next_Gen_RSA](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43957261/208287279-cb6231d1-7f8a-48bb-b022-446d149249aa.PNG)
```python
from Crypto.Util.number import *
from sympy import *
flag = b'REDACTED'

e = 65537
P, R = getPrime(512), getPrime(512)
Q, S = nextprime(P), nextprime(R)
PQRS = P * Q * R * S
m = bytes_to_long(flag)
c = pow(m, e, PQRS)

"""

c = 
"""
```
